metadata.title: CVE-2019-9032 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libmatio.a in matio (aka MAT File I/O Library) 1.5.13. There is an out-of-bounds write problem causing a SEGV in the function Mat_VarFree() in mat.c.

criterions.comment: libmatio package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.13-3').
